=============
Configuration
=============

To install django-markup just add the package to your ``INSTALLED_APPS``
setting within your ``settings.py``::

    # settings.py
    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'django_markup',
    )

Thats all. To start using it, see the following tutorials:

   :maxdepth: 1
    
   usage_templates
   usage_python
   usage_models
